definition: also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
in other words/that is to say/so/thus
(reduplicated) whether... or.../never mind/fine (indicating acceptance or resignation)
as empty as anything (idiom); completely bereft/to have nothing/vacuous/hollow/empty (argument, head etc)
lit. 之[zhi1], 乎[hu1], 者[zhe3] and 也[ye3] (four grammatical particles of Classical Chinese) (idiom); fig. archaic expressions
not to reciprocate is against etiquette (classical)/to respond in kind
pinyin: lai2 er2 bu4 wang3 fei1 li3 ye3

definition: best not to mention it/drop it/never mind/let's not talk about it

pinyin: ye3 hao3 bu5 liao3 duo1 shao3
ye3 hao3 bu4 dao4 na3 li3 qu4

definition: (coll.) to get one's just deserts/to serve sb right/to get one's share of (good or bad things)/every dog has its day
words of a man on his deathbed always come from the heart (proverb)
pinyin: ren2 zhi1 jiang1 si3 , qi2 yan2 ye3 shan4

sentences.english: So is an change for the better, like birth and death which convulse the body.
sentences.chinese: 向更好的转变也是如此，和颠覆身体的生死一样。

sentences.english: The result is, that it is not necessary to use gibberlin acid.
sentences.chinese: 实验结果是，种子不必经过酸处理也可以发芽。

sentences.english: You’re probably one of those weirdos that doesn’t drink coffee in the morning either.
sentences.chinese: 而且你可能也是那种早晨不用喝咖啡的古怪人。

sentences.english: Smart software can also reduce medical errors.
sentences.chinese: 高智能的软体也可以减少医疗疏失。

sentences.english: Fiber will also help regulate the appearance of cellulite.
sentences.chinese: 纤维也会帮助控制脂肪团的形成。

sentences.english: Partners are less likely to feel ignored or disrespected.
sentences.chinese: 同伴也不容易感到被忽视或者不受尊重。

sentences.english: We do not have a bath tub, nor a shower on the train.
sentences.chinese: 车上没有浴盆，也没有沐浴设备。

sentences.english: Father Mabeuf was one of those persons for whom plants have souls.
sentences.chinese: 和某些人一样，马白夫公公也认为植物是有灵魂的。

sentences.english: However, satisfaction also appears to be influenced by psychologic factors.
sentences.chinese: 然而，满意程度似乎也是整个身体的影响因素之一。

sentences.english: In this way Pingya's room had been fumigated before he was moved in.
sentences.chinese: 所以平亚搬进他的新屋子之前，也得要用烟熏。

sentences.english: It turns out Jialing is one of the oldest and largest motorcycle manufacturers in its home country.
sentences.chinese: 嘉陵是中国最古老也是最大的摩托车生产商之一。

sentences.english: But even that makes insecure Pakistanis jumpy.
sentences.chinese: 但是即使那样也使感觉不安全的巴基斯坦人心惊肉跳。

sentences.english: A cultural icon, he is widely known by the single name Elvis.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个文化符号，他的名字埃尔维斯也广为人知。

sentences.english: Canada is meanwhile getting older and its population is shifting westwards.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大面临人口老龄化，人口重心也在西移。

sentences.english: You can also create ringtones out of songs you downloaded.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以将你下载的歌曲制作成手机铃声。

sentences.english: Also write down the time of day and the time of year.
sentences.chinese: 也不要忘了记下年月日和时刻。

definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
